author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION TWO FORMS IN THE BAY OF CAMPECHE...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION TWO FORMS IN THE BAY OF CAMPECHE... As of 4:00 PM CDT Sat Jun 28 the center of Two was located near 19.3, -94.2 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1011 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION TWO FORMS IN THE BAY OF CAMPECHE... As of 4:00 PM CDT Sat Jun 28 the center of Two was located near 19.3, -94.2 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1011 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Depression Two (AT2/AL022025)
